attributes.action: Stand down from office due to incompetence and neglect of the British voting public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to show the current incumbent of office that the British voting public (who didn't vote for him) do not want him in office anymore due to his constant negligence in providing the British people with what they want and need and turning the UK into a Tax everything state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
